properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: story
properties.description: The story of the text frame.

properties.name: contents
properties.description: The text contents of this text frame.

properties.name: textRange
properties.description: The text range of the text frame.

properties.name: textSelection
properties.description: The selected text (ranges) in the story.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.description: The row count in the text frame (area text only)

properties.name: columnCount
properties.description: The column count in the text frame (area text only)

properties.name: rowGutter
properties.description: The row gutter in the text frame (area text only)

properties.name: columnGutter
properties.description: The column gutter in the text frame (area text only)

properties.name: flowLinksHorizontally
properties.description: Flow text between linked frame horizontally first. (area text only)

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: The amount of spacing (path text only)

properties.name: opticalAlignment
properties.description: Is the optical alignment active?

properties.name: kind
properties.description: The type of a text frame item.

properties.name: contentVariable
properties.description: The content variable bound to this text art item.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of the text in the frame.

properties.name: textPath
properties.description: The path for the text frame (area and path text)

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: The position of the anchor point (start of base line for point text)

properties.name: startTValue
properties.description: The start position of text along a path, as a value relative to the path's segments (path text only)

properties.name: endTValue
properties.description: The end position of text along a path, as a value relative to the path's segments (path text only)

properties.name: previousFrame
properties.description: The linked text frame preceding this one.

properties.name: nextFrame
properties.description: The linked text frame following this one.

properties.name: matrix
properties.description: The transformation matrix of the text frame object.

properties.name: antialias
properties.description: The type of a text anti-aliasing on text frame item.

properties.name: firstBaseline
properties.description: The first baseline offset type for text frame item (for Area Text only)

properties.name: firstBaselineMin
properties.description: The first baseline offset minimum value for text frame item (for Area Text only)

properties.name: characters
properties.description: All the characters in this text range.

properties.name: words
properties.description: All the words in this text range.

properties.name: lines
properties.description: All the lines in this text range.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: All the paragraphs in this text range.

properties.name: textRanges
properties.description: All the text in this text range.

properties.name: insertionPoints
properties.description: All the insertion points in this text range.

methods.name: createOutline
methods.description: Convert text item to path items.

methods.name: convertAreaObjectToPointObject
methods.description: Convert Area Type Text Object To Point Type Object.

methods.name: convertPointObjectToAreaObject
methods.description: Convert Point Type Text Object To Area Type Object.

methods.name: generateThumbnailWithTextFrameProperties

parameters.name: textString
parameters.description: The text string which is to be used in the thumbnail generation.

parameters.name: fontSize
parameters.description: The size in points of the text string.

parameters.name: textColor
parameters.description: The color of the text string.

parameters.name: destinationPath
parameters.description: The location at which the thumbnail is to be stored.

methods.description: Generates the thumbnail with the properties of first character in the text frame.
